origin: Open a terminal UI connected to the Gateway
translate: 打开连接到网关的终端 UI

origin: Gateway WebSocket URL (defaults to gateway.remote.url when configured)
translate: 网关 WebSocket URL（配置后默认使用 gateway.remote.url）

origin: Session key (default: "main", or "global" when scope is global)
translate: 会话键（默认："main"；当 scope 为 global 时默认："global"）

origin: Send an initial message after connecting
translate: 连接后发送一条初始消息

origin: Agent timeout in ms (defaults to agents.defaults.timeoutSeconds)
